A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great set up from Force Awakens absolutely ruined\, key questions from first film unanswered and more disappointingly don't even matter anymore\, good sense of humour used earlier in film belittles antagonists towards the end\, I'm surprised it all went so wrong\, all they had to do was ask any star wars fan what they might want to see in this film and they would have realised they were going to disappoint. Left this movie not really caring what happens in the next one\, I'm guessing it all turns out fine. The more I think about it\, the more it upsets me.
